title: Florida Vs California On Covid, How Kavanaugh Cheated His Confirmation 3.17.21
itunes:title: Florida Vs California On Covid, How Kavanaugh Cheated His Confirmation 3.17.21
description:
In episode 838, Jack and Miles are joined by Revision Path podcast host Maurice Cherry to discuss the FBI background investigation of Brett Kavanaugh, the Derek Chauvin trial, Tucker Carlson's reaction to the Grammys, California versus Florida anti-mask behavior, a voter fraud case at a high school homecoming, deep fake moms, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. Democratic senator suggests FBI background investigation of Brett Kavanaugh fake
  2. Derek Chauvin attorney asks for trial delay, change of venue after Minneapolis settlement
  3. WATCH: Tucker Carlson - Candace Owens Reacts To WAP Performance At The GRAMMYs
  4. Writer for Tucker Carlson Resigns After ‘Abhorrent’ Online Posts Are Revealed
  5. Tucker Carlson's top writer resigns after secretly posting racist and sexist remarks in online forum
  6. Coronavirus Today: California vs. Florida
  7. High-schooler and her mother hacked school records to steal homecoming queen election, police say
  8. A Bucks County woman created ‘deepfake’ videos to harass rivals on her daughter’s cheerleading squad, DA says
  9. LISTEN: Krs. // Waiting in Vain Edit

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
